meanings.definition: One of a series of rows or levels placed one above the other.
meanings.sent1: The cake had three tiers stacked on top of each other.
meanings.sent2: The wedding cake was beautifully decorated with multiple tiers.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to climb the tiers of boxes but kept slipping down.
meanings.sent4: The skyscraper's tiers reached high into the sky, like a ladder to the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The tiers of seats in the stadium provided a clear view of the game.

meanings.definition: A layer or level of a structure.
meanings.sent1: The top tier of the building offered a stunning view of the city.
meanings.sent2: Each tier of the wedding cake was adorned with delicate flowers.
meanings.sent3: The tiers of shelves in the store were neatly organized by category.
meanings.sent4: The mountain had multiple tiers of rock formations, each more challenging to climb.
meanings.sent5: The wedding dress had intricate lace details on every tier.

meanings.definition: A grade or rank in a hierarchy.
meanings.sent1: She worked hard to climb the corporate tiers and reach a managerial position.
meanings.sent2: In the military, soldiers move up the tiers based on their performance.
meanings.sent3: The tiers of leadership in the company were clearly defined.
meanings.sent4: The royal family has different tiers of titles and responsibilities.
meanings.sent5: The academic world has various tiers of recognition for research achievements.
